title: KUT from the Kloth Stevie Straight Leg Jeans
description: PERFECT FIT: Embrace effortless style and comfort with the KUT from the Kloth Rachael High-Rise Fab Ab Mom Jeans in Imagined. These ladies' jeans are designed to flatter your figure with a high-rise cut that cinches at the waist and elongates your silhouette. The straight-leg fit offers a modern and chic look that pairs perfectly with any top or footwear choice. Say goodbye to outdated mom jeans and hello to a contemporary lady's denim staple that you'll love wearing day after day.

RAW-CUT HEMLINE: Stand out from the crowd with the unique raw-cut hemline of these jeans, adding a touch of edge and personality to your ensemble. The raw hem creates a trendy and relaxed vibe, perfect for casual outings or adding a stylish twist to your everyday look. Whether paired with sneakers for a laid-back vibe or heels for a night out, these stylish jeans make a bold fashion statement that sets you apart from the rest.

VERSATILE DESIGN: The KUT from the Kloth Rachael Mom Jeans feature vintage five-pocket styling with a five-button closure and waistline belt loops, offering both style and functionality. The belted waistband design adds a chic and polished touch, while the lightweight feel and durable construction ensure long-lasting comfort and wearability. Made from a luxurious blend of 94% cotton, 5% polyester, and 1% spandex, these versatile jeans provide a soft and stretchy feel.

CONTRAST TOPSTITCHING: Make a statement with the heavy contrast topstitching detail that adds a touch of edge to your ladies' denim collection. The bold stitching not only accentuates the classic five-pocket design but also adds visual interest and dimension, elevating these jeans from simple staples to fashion-forward essentials. Whether paired with a basic tee for a casual look or dressed up with a blouse for a night out, the contrast topstitching adds a stylish finishing touch.

IMPORTED QUALITY: Imported for superior craftsmanship and design, the KUT from the Kloth Rachael High-Rise Fab Ab Mom Jeans exemplifies the brand's commitment to excellence. With machine washable convenience, these comfortable jeans are easy to care for and maintain, ensuring they stay looking fresh and stylish wear after wear. Whether you're running errands or meeting friends for brunch, these jeans offer the perfect combination of comfort, style, and versatility.

Stay true to your carefree reputation in a jean that makes your style look sleek and effortless. The KUT from the Kloth Stevie Straight Leg Jeans in Wise features a slender straight leg with hand sanding that visually lengthens your leg. Subtle whiskering for a favorite jean look. Heavy contrast topstitching. Classic five-pocket design. Embroidered design at back pockets. Belt loop waist. Zip button fly. 99% cotton, 1% spandex. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
